scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a seated figure in a red robe and an elaborate, pointed hat, gesturing with his right hand. He is facing a standing figure dressed in a blue robe, who has a golden halo. Behind the seated figure, a person in armor with a conical helmet holds a sword. The background features a green patterned textile and a brown architectural element. To the right of the standing figure in blue, other figures with halos are partially visible, suggesting a religious context. The overall setting appears to be an interior space, possibly a chamber or hall, with decorative elements.
